fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scout (Day): You will be alerted if the Unseen attempt to visit target player. The scout will stay on the player until you command them to watch someone else.
- Expert Investigation (Night): Determine if a player is a member of the Unseen faction.
> - Can't target King
- Surveillance (Night, 3 Uses): If target player is a member of the Unseen faction, you will discover their class.
> - Can't target King

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Can only spawn if the Evil faction is Unseen.
